mainText:
Thank you Steve for being a man whose vision was bigger than life.   
You had a hand in every computer I have owned.  From the Macintosh  
SE30 I bought in 1988 to my Mac Pro today.  You opened up the world of  
computing to those of us who didn't possess a degree in computer  
engineering.  I will miss you and your creative spirit and your always  
intriguing "Oh.... and one more thing..." at the end of your keynotes  
that always meant something exciting was going to be announced.

God Speed on your continued journey.  Blessing to your family in this  
time of grief.
author: John
